name: Weird Dungeon Explorer: Defender
description:
Going down into the dark dungeon, you were not scared, but you can not so carelessly treat such places. Soon you enjoyed sounds that did not look like crumbling stones (which is very common here) and not even close to the sounds produced by local rats. Looking closely, you saw that you are not one, but many unknown creatures. And you need to survive at any cost in this fight!
In the game, the pam will have to get to a location full of hostile monsters who do not want you to get out alive.

- different types of monsters
- magic weapon
- hidden treasures

and much more is already waiting for you in the game!
